meanings.definition: Placed or located after something else
meanings.sent1: The postpositional sign was placed at the end of the street.
meanings.sent2: The postpositional note was left on the table after the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The postpositional sticker on the wall made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her postpositional position in the race put her at a disadvantage.
meanings.sent5: The postpositional label on the box was easy to miss.

meanings.definition: Following or subsequent to something else
meanings.sent1: The postpositional event happened after the party ended.
meanings.sent2: The postpositional chapter in the book revealed the mystery.
meanings.sent3: His postpositional arrival at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The postpositional decision to leave was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The postpositional day turned out to be full of surprises.

meanings.definition: A word or phrase that is placed after the noun or pronoun it modifies
meanings.sent1: In the sentence, the postpositional adds more information about the noun.
meanings.sent2: The postpositional in this sentence clarifies the subject.
meanings.sent3: The postpositional in the sentence was a helpful addition.
meanings.sent4: She used a postpositional to describe the main character.
meanings.sent5: The postpositional in the paragraph made the story more interesting.
